name: RollaDie
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roll a die
des:
-Ask Alexa to "roll a die" to know the outcome.
-Is your die lost somewhere or it is too far under your bed worry no more just ask Alexa to roll a Die and she will generate a random number out of the 1 to 6 and will tell you that outcome.
-Enjoy your game without any worries.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
